meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> has the <radical>power</radical> to <kanji>add</kanji> words together to form a sentence. Marvel at the massive and mighty power your mouth holds! You add words together in an amazing fashion!
readingMnemonic: Your parents are so proud of you for using your powerful mouth to <kanji>add</kanji> words together that they decide to surprise you with a gift. It’s a new <reading>ca</reading>r (か). It’s that shiny brand new car that you’d always wanted. You’re speechless. However, your speechlessness frustrates your parents so they decide to take away the car they just gave you. Boo hoo.
